claim().details: Allows customers to claim their purchased points from a successful sale.

finalize().details: Finalizes the sale after the end time. Anyone can call this to transition the state.

purchase(uint256).details: Allows a customer to purchase loyalty points.

refund().details: Allows customers to get a refund from a failed sale.

withdraw().details: Allows the beneficiary to withdraw the proceeds of a successful sale.
